name: 3 Hour Dungeon Crawler
description:
Not really a game, its just a bare bones Dungeon Crawler.

Small Dungeon with an Exit to get into the next room/level.

Simple FogOfWar (without checking if an obstacle is in the way)

Movement with Arrow Keys, if something goes Bad reset the game with the Spacebar.

Worked roughly 2h 30m on it.

Full Process: 

Assets by pxldev:  https://pxldev.itch.io/1-bit-pack-collection
